name: Phantom Tides
description:
Phantom Tides is a 2D action adventure platformer where find yourself captain of a pirate ship seeking crew members and venturing through various environments on your path to vengeance.

  • Explore and carve your own path
  • Unlock abilities and Items
  • Befriend or cross characters throughout your journey
  • Encounter a wide variety of enemies
  • Challenging bosses and puzzles
